docs.title: Home
docs.text:
This is the front page of the site ⚠️

This website was created from markdown files, with no code using the template https://github.com/hannesdelbeke/wiki_template

docs.title: Graph🕸️
docs.text: use mouse scroll to zoom in/out, and hold left click while dragging to pan.

docs.title: MultiMarkdown
docs.text:
In order to create valid HTML, you need properly coded syntax that can be cumbersome for “non-programmers” to write. Sometimes, you just want to easily make certain words bold, and certain words italicized without having to remember the syntax. Additionally, for example, creating lists:

  • should be easy
  • should not involve programming

MultiMarkdown

docs.text:
